channel.title: Bootstrapped #120: Small team habits part 2: Steve's turn
channel.description:
Last week @freyfogle shared his top 5 habits for small teams. This week it is my turn to share the habits I use to keep my small team productive.
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/9fb10014-548c-4582-828f-3331a8b3eb44?dark=false"></iframe>
Thanks to Balsamiq who sponsored this episode. Find out how, thanks to Balsamiq, [you can promote your bootstrapped business for free on the podcast](https://balsamiq.com/go/bootstrapped/).
Our guest sponsor, courtesy of Balsamiq, is [Checkvist](https://checkvist.com/), the professional list making tool.
You can also listen to and download this episode here: https://bootstrapped.fm/2019/12/20/120-small-team-habits-part-2-steves-turn/
